message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?
I'll give you 40%, but I think I deserve more for the risk of not getting the higher amount if we continue to negotiate.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.  We can both benefit if we end the game now.
I'm not willing to give up 60% yet. I'll offer you 30% this time, but I think I can do better if you're willing to wait.
Okay, I'm getting a little nervous about the inflation. Let's try a 45/55 split.  This is my last offer before we risk getting nothing!
